20110101022928.000|20110101022930.000|CC1|VIOLENT STORMS THROUGHOUT THE

20110101023510.000|20110101023512.000|CC1|THE MERCURY TOOK A NOSEDIVE AND

20110101023513.000|20110101023514.000|CC1|HEAVIEST SNOW OF THE SEASON, HAS

20110101023914.000|20110101023918.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110101023918.000|20110101023919.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110101023919.000|20110101023921.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110101023921.000|20110101023921.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110101023921.000|20110101023924.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110101023924.000|20110101023924.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110101023924.000|20110101023927.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110101023927.000|20110101023929.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110101023929.000|20110101023931.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110101023931.000|20110101023931.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110101023931.000|20110101023933.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110101023933.000|20110101023933.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110101023933.000|20110101023935.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110101023935.000|20110101023935.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110101023935.000|20110101023937.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110101023937.000|20110101023939.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110101023939.000|20110101023939.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110101023939.000|20110101023940.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110101023940.000|20110101023940.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110101023940.000|20110101023943.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110101023943.000|20110101023943.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110101023943.000|20110101023946.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110101023946.000|20110101023946.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110101023946.000|20110101023949.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110101023949.000|20110101023949.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110101023949.000|20110101023950.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110101023950.000|20110101023950.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110101023950.000|20110101023952.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110101023952.000|20110101023954.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110101023954.000|20110101023954.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110101023954.000|20110101023956.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110101023956.000|20110101023956.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110101023956.000|20110101023957.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110101023957.000|20110101023959.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110101023959.000|20110101023959.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110101023959.000|20110101024001.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110101024001.000|20110101024001.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110101024001.000|20110101024003.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110101024003.000|20110101024003.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110101024003.000|20110101024005.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110101024005.000|20110101024007.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110101024007.000|20110101024007.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110101024007.000|20110101024009.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110101024009.000|20110101024009.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:40:00 of 1:00:00
20110101024009.000|20110101024009.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110101024009.000|20110101024012.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110101024012.000|20110101024012.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110101024012.000|20110101024014.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110101024014.000|20110101024014.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor

20110101024015.000|20110101024018.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110101024018.000|20110101024018.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
